tool_description: Create Tracker QR Code eTickets for events or parties to track usage and validate via Mobile Client Apps
name: QR Ticket Tracker Generator
title: QR Ticket Tracker Generator

api_list.name: QR Ticket Tracker
api_list.description:
The Progwhiz Tracker QR Code Ticket Maker empowers
Group Companies & Resellers the ability to Easily
Create Professional Tracker QR Codes with the
following features:

- Embed Logo, Opaque or Translucent Logo
- Logo White Space Optional
- Magnify Logo to desired size
- Create Ticket Tracking QR Code 
- Create updated Ticket with QR Code Embedded
- Place QR in any position on the Ticket
- Option to use Auto generate Tracking ID or one provided
- Place text on the revised Ticket Image , can adjust size and location
- Client Side Apps to scan and verify (Android/iOS)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-ticket-tracker-generator.p.rapidapi.com/qrticketapi.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-ticket-tracker-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-ticket-tracker-generator.p.rapidapi.com/qrticketapi.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-ticket-tracker-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
